sentences.english: He recommends regular hot water rinses and massaging of the scalp with fingertips.
sentences.chinese: 他建議使用溫熱水漂洗，而且用手指點觸按摩頭皮。

sentences.english: Wait a few minutes, then rinse it out and wash as usual.
sentences.chinese: 幾分鐘後，漂洗掉醋，像往常一樣沖洗頭髮就可以了。

sentences.english: Shampoo with baking soda, and rinse with apple cider vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 蘇打粉洗頭，蘋果醋漂洗。

sentences.english: Operates machine that automatically washes and rinses linen.
sentences.chinese: 操作自動水洗及漂洗布草的機器。

sentences.english: Rinse out the soap from the washing.
sentences.chinese: 把洗濯物上的肥皂漂洗乾淨。

sentences.english: The contents of amino acids got from leaf surface of resistant varieties by water rinsing were more than those of susceptible ones.
sentences.chinese: 抗性品種葉表水漂洗物中氨基酸含量高於感性品種。

sentences.english: He rinsed out the sea water from his bathing suit.
sentences.chinese: 他把游泳衣上的海水漂洗掉。

sentences.english: Give the shirts at least three rinses.
sentences.chinese: 這幾件襯衫至少要漂洗三遍。

sentences.english: I am a poor girl, and I am rinsing yarn.
sentences.chinese: 我是個可憐的女孩，在這裏漂洗線團。

sentences.english: After you've washed your shirt, you have to rinse it twice with clean warm water.
sentences.chinese: 洗完襯衣後，你必須用乾淨的溫水漂洗兩遍。

sentences.english: Also I?m now a tutor, maybe I will more fulling.
sentences.chinese: 我現在的導師，也許我會更漂洗。

sentences.english: Standard equipped with auto fill-in and drain-out function.
sentences.chinese: 配備自動加排漂洗液功能。

sentences.english: When besmirch purify, even after rinse clean.
sentences.chinese: 當污漬去除後，還要用清水漂洗乾淨。

sentences.english: Having washed the towels, she began to rinse them.
sentences.chinese: 洗完毛巾後，她開始把它們漂洗乾淨。

sentences.english: Hot immediately after the bracken to the cold water with a clean, rinse.
sentences.chinese: 燙後的蕨菜要馬上用乾淨的冷水進行漂洗。

sentences.english: This water-based industrial washing machine washes, rinses, and dries small to medium size parts.
sentences.chinese: 這種水基工業洗滌器洗滌，漂洗，烘乾中小型零部件。
